moreBlocks.articles:
• Bankruptcy
    The attorneys at the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl have more than 25 years of experience representing individual and business debtors in connection with bankruptcy.
  • Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 7 bankruptcy, often called a liquidation or straight bankruptcy, is the most common type of bankruptcy proceeding.
  • Chapter 11
    Contact our Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Maryland Attorney.
  • Chapter 13 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 13 Bankruptcy is a way for people to "reorganize" their debt into a manageable, monthly payment plan that is fair for the individual's creditors.
  • Tax Controversy
    We provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

description:
Based in Owings Mills, Maryland, Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, represents clients in bankruptcy and tax litigation matters. Our law firm serves clients in the city of Baltimore, and in Harford County, Carroll County, Baltimore County and Howard County through its six convenient locations.

Our bankruptcy practice consists of representation for personal bankruptcy, through Chapter 7 liquidation and Chapter 13 debt reorganization, and business bankruptcy, through Chapter 11. Our law firm also offers experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

With more than 20 years of experience as an attorney and more than 30 years of experience as a certified public accountant (CPA), Robert Stahl possesses the skill and knowledge to lead our legal team. Our law firm has been helping individual and business debtors with bankruptcy and tax concerns since 1983. We are dedicated to helping clients achieve the successful resolution of their debt and tax problems.

Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, can offer the tax or debt help you need for a fresh start. Contact us today for a free initial consultation. Evening and weekend appointments are available upon request and we accept all major credit cards.
